sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Rating = ({ value, text, color }) => { return (
= 1 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 0.2 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 2 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 1.2 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 3 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 2.2 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 4 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 3.2 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> = 5 ? 'fas fa-star' : value >= 4.2 ? 'fas fa-star-half-alt' : 'far fa-star'}> {text && text}
) } Rating.defaultProps = { color: '#f8e825', } export default Rating
